name: 211 Brevard Inc
description: 211 Brevard provides assistance and referrals in times of emotional, financial and community crisis. The agency manages the 211 community helpline, is the local 988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline center and serves as the community disaster hotline for Brevard County Emergency Management as well as being the local lead agency for Help Me Grow and the Florida Veterans Support Line.

locations.name: 211 Brevard Contact Center
locations.description: Provides immediate crisis and suicide intervention as well as information about and referral to health and human services, governmental services and hurricane preparation and recovery services. Also provides referrals to internal programs for care coordination for special populations such as young families, veterans and people with addictions. Call 211 24/7 or text ZIP code to 898211 9am-midnight.

schedules.description: 24 hours a day, seven days a week

locations.name: 211 Brevard - Help Me Grow Brevard
locations.description: Assist callers with questions regarding the behavioral and developmental concerns about a child, facilitate developmental screenings and provide ongoing support through care coordination. Help Me Grow is a national initiative for which 211 Brevard is the local affiliate.

services.name: TJ-4500.6500
services.description: A searchable database of governmental, health and human services located in or available to those residing in Brevard County, FL.

schedules.description: 24 hours a day, seven days a week

services.name: TJ-3000.1500
services.description: Assessment for, information about and referral to health, human services, governmental services as well as hurricane preparation and recovery services
services.eligibility_description: Anyone seeking crisis intervention or needing help finding community services in Brevard County, FL

languages.name: English; others available by interpreter service

schedules.description: Office: Monday - Friday 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.; Seven days a week 24 hour hotline

services.name: RP-1500.1400-800
services.description: Immediate assistance for individuals who are having suicidal feelings with the objective of finding alternatives to self-harm or self-destruction.
